abstract: The man whose grandfather chiseled the missing St. Patrick's cornerstone wondered whether the family story was true.
snippet: The man whose grandfather chiseled the missing St. Patrick's cornerstone wondered whether the family story was true.
lead_paragraph: The cornerstone for St. Patrick's Cathedral in Midtown Manhattan is still missing, but the great-grandson of Cormack McCall, who installed the stone in the 19th century, has turned up.

headline.main: Missing It Is, but St. Patrick's Cornerstone Is Family Lore
